task.title: Rendering output to PDF, EPUB, XHTML and oXygen's webhelp
task.shortdesc: The DITA-OT (with the DITAforPublishers plug in) can render to common formats out of the box. At the time of writing, the PDF output is underwhleming but useable. EPUB files are suitable for ereaders, and web-based output are suitable for browsers.
